news.title: 风暴、枪击、背叛…全球炸锅
墨西哥足球场遭枪手袭击致11死
news.title0: Gunmen storm Mexico football pitch and kill at least 11 people
news.content: 墨西哥萨拉曼卡市一足球场遭武装分子袭击，造成至少11人死亡，包括妇女儿童。
news.content0: At least 11 people were killed and another dozen injured when gunmen opened fire on locals who had gathered at a football pitch in the city of Salamanca in central Mexico on Sunday.Witnesses said armed men arrived at the grounds in several vehicles and shot at those gathered there seemingly indiscriminately.Many families had stayed behind to socialise after a match between local clubs. At least one woman and one child were among those killed.The motive behind the shooting is not yet clear. Guanajuato, the state in which Salamanca is located, registered the highest number of murders in the whole of Mexico last year.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国前内政大臣布拉弗曼转投改革党
news.title0: Braverman accuses Tories of betrayal as she defects to Reform
news.content: 英国前内政大臣苏埃拉·布拉弗曼宣布退出保守党，加入奈杰尔·法拉奇的改革党，并指责保守党“背叛”。
news.content0: Former Home Secretary Suella Braverman has accused the Conservatives of "betrayal" as she became the latest MP from the party to defect to Reform UK.She is the third sitting Tory MP to join Nigel Farage's party in the last eleven days, and takes Reform's tally of MPs to eight.At a press conference following her defection, Braverman said she had felt "politically homeless for the best part of two years" pointing to differences over areas including Brexit and immigration.Her defection comes hot on the heels of Robert Jenrick and Andrew Rosindell, who also left the Conservatives earlier this month.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国私人飞机坠毁致7死1伤
news.title0: Seven people killed and one injured in private jet crash in Maine
news.content: 美国缅因州一架私人飞机起飞时坠毁并起火，机上8人中7人死亡，1名机组人员重伤。
news.content0: Seven people were killed and one was seriously injured after a private jet crashed while taking off from Bangor International Airport in the US state of Maine.The Bombardier Challenger 600 went down at around 19:45 local time (00:45 GMT on Monday), the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) said. The lone survivor of the crash was a member of the flight crew.The incident came as adangerous winter storm barrelled across a large swathe ofthe US, killing several people and leaving hundreds of thousands without power. Pilots had reportedly been struggling with visibility at the airport before the crash.Bangor remains under a winter storm warning until Tuesday, with heavy snowfall forecast.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 欧盟对马斯克X平台AI展开调查
news.title0: Europe opens major probe into Elon Musk’s X after outcry over sexualized images
news.content: 欧盟对埃隆·马斯克旗下X平台的Grok聊天机器人展开广泛调查，因其能生成包括儿童在内的色情图像。
news.content0: The European Union has launched a wide-reaching investigation into Elon Musk’s Grok chatbot on X following global outrage over its ability to generate sexually explicit images, including of children.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主体育场设计，耗资23亿澳元，灵感源自当地住宅风格。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 菲律宾渡轮沉没致至少18人死亡
news.title0: At least 18 killed and hundreds rescued in Philippines ferry disaster
news.content: 菲律宾南部一艘载有350多人的渡轮沉没，造成至少18人死亡，数百人获救。
news.content0: A ferry with more than 350 people on board sank early Monday near an island in the southern Philippines, killing at least18 people, officials said. Rescuers saved hundreds more, while a fleet of coast guard and naval ships searched for those still missing.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 北约秘书长警告欧洲离不开美国
news.title0: NATO Chief Says Europe Is ‘Dreaming’ if It Thinks It Can Defend Itself Without U.S.
news.content: 北约秘书长马克·吕特警告欧洲，若认为没有美国也能自卫，那是在“做梦”。
news.content0: Mark Rutte, the secretary general of NATO, warned Europe on Monday that it could not defend itself without the United States in remarks aimed to address the growing worries that the United States and Europe are pulling apart over President Trump’s ambitions for Greenland.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 加拿大白鲸或将迁往美国
news.title0: Canadian Beluga Whales Could Find New Homes in United States
news.content: 加拿大濒临破产的海洋公园计划将约30头白鲸送往美国海洋馆，而非此前威胁的安乐死。
news.content0: After threatening to euthanize about 30 beluga whales, Marineland, a shuttered Canadian aquatic park, is now likely to send the animals to marine facilities in the United States, the Canadian government said on Monday.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 英国将迎强风暴“钱德拉”
news.title0: Storm Chandra forecast to bring snow, strong winds and heavy rain to UK
news.content: 英国气象局命名风暴“钱德拉”，预计将给英国大部分地区带来强风、暴雨和降雪。
news.content0: A major storm forecast to bring strong winds, heavy rain and snow across much of the UK on Tuesday has been named by The Met Office as Storm Chandra.
news.author: Sky News
